titles.title: Open The Eyes Of My Heart

properties.copyright: 1997 Integrity's Hosanna! Music, Administered by Integrity Music, Inc.
properties.verseOrder: v1 v1 c1 b1 v1 c1 b1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
E
Open the eyes of my heart Lord
Open the eyes of my heart
I want to see You
I want to see You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
To see You high and lifted up
Shining in the light of Your glory
Pour out Your power and love
As we sing holy holy holy

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Holy holy holy
Holy holy holy
Holy holy holy
I want to see You
